actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add circuit breaker logic to the backend provider switching system to prevent cascading failures and improve reliability during LLM provider outages.
implementation_steps: Research and select a lightweight circuit breaker library (e.g., opossum).
Wrap provider switching and health check endpoints with circuit breaker logic.
Add configuration for failure thresholds and reset timeouts.
Log circuit breaker state changes for observability.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Inject correlation IDs into all backend requests to enable tracing across services and improve debugging and monitoring.
implementation_steps: Create middleware to generate and attach correlation IDs to incoming requests.
Pass correlation IDs to downstream services and logs.
Update logging format to include correlation IDs.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement MongoDB Compound Indexes for Analytics Queries
actionable_tasks.description: Create compound indexes in MongoDB to optimize performance of analytics queries, especially for engagement KPIs and listening patterns.
implementation_steps: Identify frequently queried fields in analytics collections.
Define and create compound indexes for these fields.
Test query performance before and after index creation.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Set up TTL indexes in MongoDB to automatically expire old telemetry data and manage storage efficiently.
implementation_steps: Identify telemetry collections that require data rotation.
Create TTL indexes with appropriate expiration times.
Monitor data expiration and adjust as needed.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Prometheus Metrics Export for Alerting
actionable_tasks.description: Integrate Prometheus metrics export in the backend to enable alerting and monitoring of key performance indicators.
implementation_steps: Install and configure the Prometheus client library.
Expose metrics endpoint for Prometheus scraping.
Define and export key metrics (e.g., request latency, error rates).

actionable_tasks.title: Complete Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Finish the frontend implementation of the Spotify authentication interface to ensure seamless user login and OAuth flow.
implementation_steps: Review and complete missing UI elements for Spotify OAuth.
Ensure proper handling of OAuth callbacks and token storage.
Test authentication flow end-to-end.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Metrics Collection for Performance Monitoring
actionable_tasks.description: Enhance backend to collect and expose comprehensive performance metrics for monitoring and optimization.
implementation_steps: Identify key performance metrics to collect (e.g., response times, error rates).
Implement middleware to capture and aggregate metrics.
Expose metrics via API endpoint for dashboard integration.
